name: Pizza Souls
description:
"Boo! Welcome to my haunted island. Find me and deliver me a pizza, and I'll promise you riches beyond your dreams. But be careful: lots of dangerous enemies lurk here. Are you brave enough?"

Find all pumpkins to unlock a secret ending!

TEAM

André Fernandes - programmer

Cátia Gonçalves - game design ideas
